text.section:
The Secretary may issue an order under subsection (a) of this section:
If, prior to the issuance of a proclamation under § 14-3A-02 of the Public Safety Article, the Secretary determines that the disease or outbreak can be medically contained by the Department and appropriate health care providers; and
As necessary to implement an order issued by the Governor under § 14-3A-02 of the Public Safety Article.
